com.st.st25sdk.type4a

Class NdefFileType4

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.type4a.FileType4
      • com.st.st25sdk.type4a.NdefFileType4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface

    public class NdefFileType4
extends FileType4
implements CacheInterface
    Defines all required methods to handle a NFC Forum Type4 NDEF file.

    • Method Detail

      • writeNdefMsg

        public void writeNdefMsg(NDEFMsg msg)
                  throws STException
        This method assumes that a select has already been done. It writes the NDEF message to the file currently selected.
        Parameters:
        msg - The NDEF message to be written
        Throws:
        STException

      • selectAndWriteNdefMsg

        public void selectAndWriteNdefMsg(NDEFMsg msg,
                                  byte[] writePassword)
                           throws STException
        This method will select the NDEF file, present the write password and write the NDEF message.
        Parameters:
        msg - the NDEF message to be written
        writePassword - the password to present before writing the NDEF message
        Throws:
        STException

      • readNdefMsg

        public NDEFMsg readNdefMsg()
